name: Faith
message: Elisha, you are my forever. Here’s to a lifetime of love and adventure!

name: Mom & Dad
message: Our hearts are overflowing with joy! May your marriage be filled with laughter, love, and endless happiness.

name: Best Man - Kevin
message: Elisha, I’ve known you forever—now you have your forever in Faith! Wishing you both a lifetime of love.

name: Maid of Honor - Susan
message: Faith, you are the most beautiful bride! May this day be the beginning of the best chapter yet.

name: Grandparents
message: True love is a gift—nurture it, cherish it, and never stop choosing each other. Congratulations!

name: Your Cousin Alex
message: Seeing you both together is a dream come true. Wishing you a lifetime of happiness!

name: Aunt Mary
message: Faith and Elisha, you are a match made in heaven. May every sunrise bring you new joy and every sunset peace.

name: Family Friend - Daniel
message: Love like yours is rare and beautiful. Cherish it always. Congratulations!
